choices: Leslie Knope, Deputy Director of the Parks and Rec Department
Ann Perkins, Nurse and Public Relations Director of the Parks and Rec Department
April Ludgate, former intern and Asst. to the Deputy Director
How about all three lovely ladies?
Someone else
1.content:
Welcome to the wonderful town of Pawnee, IN! Pawnee is the crown jewel of America's heartland and home to many wonderful attractions and people! The people of Pawnee are a loving, wonderful people and open to all kinds (so long as they don't hail from that hellhole of Eagleton). Pawneeans have hearts the size of lions and, statistically speaking, asses the size of buses.

But enough about the town of Pawnee! Which lovely lady of the Pawnee Parks and Recreation should be the focus of our story?
1.title: First in Friendship, Fourth in Obesity

choices: Leslie seeks solace in Paunch Burger and other treats due to a new project
Leslie discovers Ben likes larger women and seeks to accommodate his preference
Seeing a lack of plus-sized female leaders, Leslie decides to become one herself
WHAT IF: Leslie never joined the Pawnee govt. and finds herself looking larger
Something else
11.content: How might our blonde, overachiever bureaucrat find herself growing larger?
11.title: Leslie Knope, Deputy Director of the Parks and ...

choices: Ann gets reassigned to desk duty at St. Joseph's and gets an office ass to boot
Ann discovers her new beau is an FA and discovers her enjoyment in getting fat
Ann is mysteriously getting fat and suspects someone in the Dept is to blame
WHAT IF: Ann and Andy never break up and Ann falls prey to Andy's lazy lifestyle
Something else
12.content: Ann Perkins! How will our poetic and noble land-mermaid find herself growing larger?

choices: April and Andy's lazy lifestyle catches up with them and their waistlines
To spite Ann's new health initiative, April fattens herself with Paunch Burger
Being Ron Swanson's assistant, April finds herself with some new eating habits
WHAT IF: Instead of a moody outcast, April grew up a chubby, cheery overachiever
Something else

15.content:
What about some of the other female characters of the show?

Ron's Love Interests:

Diane Lewis - His girlfriend in the later seasons.

Tammy 2 - His ex-wife from the earlier seasons, played Megan Mullally

Tom's Love Interests:

Wendy - The woman he marries for a green card marriage (she's a doctor and from canada).

Mona-Lisa Saperstein - His best friend's sister who becomes a love interest in later seasons.

Even more?
15.title: Someone else

info.brief_description: The lovely ladies of the Pawnee Parks and Rec Dept. find themselves packing on the pounds
info.description:
A few basic rules to start off:

No male weight gain

No slob elements to the story besides some burping and slight messiness

No scat or vore or popping or anything like that

Other than that really anything goes as long as it pertains to ladies of Pawnee expanding their waistlines. Feel free to let the creative juices flow and expand the story! I'll be the first to admit I am not the most adept writer, but generally hope those wishing to add to the story please try your best!
